Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Directs the president of the state civil service commission to publish reports annually relating to diversity within state government
Summary: Directs the president of the state civil service commission to publish reports annually relating to diversity within state government.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to directing the president of the state civil service commission to publish reports relating to diversity within the state government
